sn14.9:1.2: This integrates the factors feeling and contact from the internal pentad (SN 14.4). Compared with other presentations (such as MN 18:16.1), it appears to do so incorrectly; we would expect contact, then feeling, perception, thought, desire, passion, and gains. Another sequence at DN 21:2.2.2 also appears confused. DN 15:9.1 has name and form, then contact, feeling, craving, searching, and gaining.
